      • isBlockBanned

        public static boolean isBlockBanned(org.bukkit.block.Block block)
        Returns:
        If the given block is a disabled item (set in the config).

      • isItemBanned

        public static boolean isItemBanned(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                   int id,
                   int data)
        Note: It checks this player's permissions for tekkitrestrict.noitem.id[.data] and for tekkitrestrict.bypass.noitem
        Returns:
        If the given id:data combination is banned for this player.

      • isItemGloballyBanned

        public static boolean isItemGloballyBanned(int id,
                           int data)
        Returns:
        If the given item/block is banned in the config.

      • isItemBannedInCreative

        public static boolean isItemBannedInCreative(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                             int id,
                             int data)
        Note: It checks this player's permissions for tekkitrestrict.creative.id[.data] and for tekkitrestrict.bypass.creative
        Returns:
        If the given id:data combination is banned for this player when he/she is in creative mode.
